table_name.title: Table name
table_name.description: Table name for the table to be generated/updated in Keboola Storage

download_request.title: Download request
download_request.description: May be either a bulk or a reporting download request.

bulk_download_request.title: Bulk download request
bulk_download_request.description: Specification to request data via the Bulk API

data_scope.title: Data scope
data_scope.description: Defines the scope or types of data to download.

download_entities.title: Download entities
download_entities.description: The entities to include in the download.

since_last_sync_time.title: Only download changes since the last run

report_time_zone.title: Report time zone
report_time_zone.description: Determines the time zone that is used to establish today's date.

report_format_version.title: Format version
report_format_version.description: Determines the format for certain fields in the downloaded report file.

report_return_only_complete_data.title: Return only complete data
report_return_only_complete_data.description: Determines whether or not the service must ensure that all the data has been processed and is available.

report_time.title: Time
report_time.description: The time period to use for the report. You can specify a custom date range or select one of the predefined date ranges.

predefined_time.title: A predefined date range value. Each report request type specifies the predefined time periods that you can specify for each aggregation type.

oneOf.title: Custom time
oneOf.description: Custom date range

date_range_start.title: Date range start
date_range_start.description: Start date of the date range.

date_range_end.title: Date range end
date_range_end.description: End date of the date range.

report_aggregation.title: Report aggregation
report_aggregation.description: The type of aggregation to use to aggregate the report data.

report_download_request.title: Report download request
report_download_request.description: Specification to request data via the Reporting API

oneOf.title: AccountPerformance report download request
oneOf.description: Specification to request report of type AccountPerformance

report_type.title: Report type
report_type.description: The reporting service provides reports that you can use to track finances, measure ad performance, and adjust settings to optimize your budget or campaign. The service supports the majority of popular reports available in the Microsoft Advertising web application.

columns.title: Columns
columns.description: The columns to include in the report
